Join our team and discover for yourself as a Senior Principal Systems Development Engineer on our HPC Solutions Engineering team in Austin, TX.DescriptionAs an HPC Senior Principal Development Engineer you will be primarily focused on the Federal HPC segment where you will be conducting research on new HPC technologies and working on developing Dell Technology’s next generation HPC solutions while supporting, leading and representing HPC Engineering on Federal focused accounts and initiatives. You will represent Dell HPC Engineering in cross domain global teams and core program meetings and forums. Primary responsibilities for this position include conducting proof of concept studies on new technologies, benchmarking applications, profiling and optimizing applications on Dell’s HPC systems and designing optimal HPC systems based on customer’s needs. This position requires a strong understanding of processor architectures, tools used for performance profiling and optimization, performance impact of interconnects and storage subsystem as well as excellent hands-on Linux skills.
